data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 610,400 souls living in the county of Nuapada with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nuapada, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Nuapada.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary: On average, 49 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nuapada, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Nuapada.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Nuapada.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Sapru people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Sapru people know you.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Nuapada, Odisha, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, please give the church in the county of Nuapada prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: There are 610,400 people living in the county of Nuapada. Only about 6,714 might be believers.

location.name: Nuapada
